G

Game - Class in topdown
Main class which runs the program and holds the most important methods used to keep track of essential game elements/information.
Game() - Constructor for class topdown.Game
Constructor initializes many of the instance variables created above and creates the window on which the game wil run, adds keyControls, adds a mouseListener, and calls on two methods used to begin the game.
GameObject - Class in topdown
Abstract class used to monitor and alter the properties of GameObjects.
GameObject(int, int, Type, Handler) - Constructor for class topdown.GameObject
Constructor takes in many parameters and uses them to determine the properties of the GameObject.
GameOverScreen - Class in topdown
Class used to display the Game Over screen.
GameOverScreen(Game) - Constructor for class topdown.GameOverScreen
Constructor initializes the Strings and sets this Game equal to the instance ofGame provided in the parameters.
GameScreen - Class in topdown
Class used to display the Game screen.
GameScreen(Game, Player) - Constructor for class topdown.GameScreen
Constructor initializes variables and sets this Game equal to the provided instance of Game, and same for Player.
GameWonScreen - Class in topdown
Class used to display the Game Won screen.
GameWonScreen(Game) - Constructor for class topdown.GameWonScreen
Constructor initializes Strings ad sets this Game equal to the Game provided in the parameters.
getBounds() - Method in class topdown.Bullet
Returns the boundaries of the bullet as a rectangle.
getBounds() - Method in class topdown.Enemy
Returns the boundaries of the enemy based on its size as a rectangle.
getBounds() - Method in class topdown.GameObject
Returns the bonds of the current rectangle.
getBounds() - Method in class topdown.Player
Returns the boundaries of the player.
getBounds() - Method in class topdown.Wall
Returns the boundaries o the wall as a rectangle.
getFrameCount() - Method in class topdown.Game
Returns the integer value for the frames per second for the current game.
getHealth() - Method in class topdown.Enemy
Returns an int that represents the current health of the enemy object.
getHealth() - Method in class topdown.Player
Returns an int that represents the current health of the player.
getHEIGHT() - Method in class topdown.Game
Returns an integer value for the height of the current game screen.
getHeight() - Method in class topdown.Wall
Returns integer value for the height of the wall.
getList() - Method in class topdown.Handler
Returns the current list of game objects.
getMoney() - Method in class topdown.Player
Returns the amount of money the player currently has.
getOverShield() - Method in class topdown.Player
Returns the amount of shield the player currently has.
getState() - Method in class topdown.Game
Returns the State object for the state of the game currently.
getTime() - Method in class topdown.SecondTimer
Returns the current time left for the game.
getType() - Method in class topdown.GameObject
Returns the Type value for the current game object.
getVelX() - Method in class topdown.GameObject
Returns the velocity in the X-direction for the current game object.
getVelY() - Method in class topdown.GameObject
Returns the velocity in the Y-direction for the current game object.
getWIDTH() - Method in class topdown.Game
Returns an integer value for the width of the current game screen.
getWidth() - Method in class topdown.Wall
Returns integer value for the width of the wall.
getX() - Method in class topdown.GameObject
Returns the position of the X value for the current game object.
getY() - Method in class topdown.GameObject
Returns the position of the Y value for the current game object.
